consistent_month.description: Weekly goal met for 4 consecutive weeks

home.title: Today
home.noActivityHint: Start by adding your first workout!

welcome.title: Welcome to Spix

goal.label: Step 1
goal.title: What's your main goal?
goal.description: This will help us personalize your experience

level.label: Step 2
level.title: What's your current level?
level.description: No pressure, we all start somewhere!

frequency.title: How many times per week do you want to train?
frequency.description: This will set your weekly goal

ready.title: Let's go! üöÄ
ready.subtitle: You're ready to start your fitness journey. Every workout counts!

repCounter.title: Exercise Counter
repCounter.selectHint: Select the exercise you want to track
repCounter.cameraNote: The camera uses AI to detect your movements
repCounter.cameraPosition: Position your phone sideways for a profile view
repCounter.volumeHint: Turn up the volume for encouragement! üîä

calibration.title: Calibration
calibration.startPedaling: Start pedaling at your normal pace...

exitConfirm.title: Quit tracking?
exitConfirm.message: Your progress will not be saved.

pushups.default: Place your phone face down under your chest
pushups.camera: Place your phone to the side for a profile view

situps.default: Place your phone on your chest, screen up
situps.camera: Place your phone to the side for a profile view

squats.default: Hold the phone against your chest
squats.camera: Place the phone in front of you or to the side

jumpingJacks.default: Hold the phone in your hand
jumpingJacks.camera: Place the phone in front of you, facing you

plank.default: Place the phone to the side for a profile view
plank.camera:
Place the phone to the side for a profile view.

üí° Tip: Turn up the volume to hear sounds!

elliptical.default: Position your phone so your head is visible in the camera
elliptical.camera:
The app will detect your movement by analyzing your head motion.

üí° A short calibration is needed before starting.
elliptical.manual:
Press play to start the timer.

A sound will play every 5 min to motivate you!

repCounter.ellipticalManualNote: Press Play/Pause to control the timer
repCounter.ellipticalAutoNote: Calibration required to automatically detect pedaling

elliptical.calibrationIntro: Position your phone so the camera can see your head. Don't worry, this will be quick!
funnyStillPhrases: Stay still. Yes, this is the hardest part of your workout today. üòÖ
Don't move. It's like a photo, but it lasts 5 seconds and it's very annoying. üì∏
Calibrating. If you move, the sensors think you're an earthquake. üåç
Be a mannequin. You got this. ü§ñ
Still like a Greek statue. Without the toga. üèõÔ∏è
funnyStillDone: Congrats! World record for not moving: 5 seconds. üèÜ
Perfect! You'd make an excellent royal guard. üíÇ
elliptical.waitingForMovement: Waiting for you to start moving...
elliptical.calibrationMovingHint: Get ready to pedal at your normal pace...
elliptical.calibrationKeepMoving: Keep pedaling for a few seconds while I analyze your rhythm...
elliptical.calibrationKeepStill: Stay still for a few seconds so I can detect the difference...
elliptical.calibrationReady: I'm ready to automatically detect when you're pedaling. Let's go!
elliptical.calibrationFailed: Not enough movement detected ‚Äî please pedal a bit faster and try again

settings.title: Settings
settings.keepGoingEllipticalOnly: Elliptical only - other exercises play sounds every 10 reps
settings.keepGoingError: Interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes
settings.showGamificationTabDesc: XP, levels and quests in navigation

disableSocialConfirm.title: Disable social features?
disableSocialConfirm.message: This will permanently delete your online data (profile, leaderboard, XP, friends, encouragements). Your local data (workouts, meals, measures) will be kept.

settings.disableSocialSuccess: Online data deleted. Local mode active.
settings.shareUnavailable: Sharing is not available on this device
settings.deleteDataError: Unable to delete data. Try again later.
settings.streakReminderEnabled: You'll get a daily reminder at {{time}} if you haven't worked out yet.

recalculateConfirm.title: Recalculate level?
recalculateConfirm.message: This will recalculate your level and quests based on your current entries.

settings.recalculateDone: Your level and quests have been updated.

clearDataConfirm.title: Reset all data?
clearDataConfirm.message: This action cannot be undone. All your workouts, meals and measurements will be deleted.

sports.addSubtitle: Create a sport tailored to your practice
sports.fieldsHint: Select the information you want to record
sports.deleteMessage: The sport "{{name}}" will be permanently deleted.
sports.errorNoFields: Select at least one field to track
sports.infoText: Hide sports you don't practice, or create your own custom sports with the fields of your choice.

settings.weightReminderTimeDesc: Choose when to remind you to weigh yourself
settings.weightReminderMonthly: On the {{day}}th of each month at {{time}}
settings.labsEmptyDesc: New experimental features will appear here.
settings.developerWarning: These options are for developers. Use with caution.
settings.skipSensorSelectionDesc: Disable to skip directly to positioning screen
settings.enableToolsScreenDesc: Very experimental! Shows the Tools icon in the nav bar.

pollination.title: Pollination AI
pollination.disconnectMessage: You will no longer be able to use AI meal analysis features.
pollination.warningMessage: This feature uses Pollination.ai API to analyze your meal photos. By connecting, you agree that your meal images may be processed by Pollination services. This feature is experimental and may collect usage data.
pollination.betaWarning: Beta feature - Pollination may collect data for service improvement
pollination.successMessage: You can now use AI meal analysis with Ploppy.

pollinationCallback.processingMessage: Please wait while we connect your account.
pollinationCallback.successMessage: You can now use AI meal analysis with Ploppy.
pollinationCallback.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again from Settings.

enhancedMeal.title: Enhanced Meal Page
enhancedMeal.description: Beautiful new meal page with AI analysis by Ploppy
enhancedMeal.enabledInfo: When you add a meal from the home screen, the new enhanced page will open instead of the classic form.

openFoodFacts.title: OpenFoodFacts
openFoodFacts.description: Scan barcodes to view nutritional information
openFoodFacts.enabledInfo: A "Quick Check" button will appear on the home screen to scan food products.

onboarding.title: Welcome to Ploppy! üê¶
onboarding.subtitle: Your AI nutrition assistant
onboarding.privacyNote: Your photos are analyzed then deleted. No data is kept.
onboarding.fossWarning: FOSS version doesn't support Ploppy (no cloud services)

settings.title: Ploppy Settings
settings.disconnectMessage: You'll need to reconnect to use Ploppy.

addEntry.title: What do you want to add?
addEntry.subtitle: Choose an activity
addEntry.durationErrorPositive: Invalid duration - enter a positive number of minutes
addEntry.durationErrorNumber: Invalid duration - enter a number of minutes

social.title: Social
social.noFriendsHint: Add friends to compare your progress!
social.authTitle: Sign in to access social features
social.authSubtitle: Compare your performance with friends, send encouragements and climb the leaderboard!
social.notConfiguredSubtitle: This project is open-source. To enable social features, configure Supabase in the .env file
social.fossSubtitle: You are using the FOSS edition of Spix, built for F-Droid.
social.fossInfo: This version complies with F-Droid guidelines and doesn't include proprietary services. Social features (leaderboard, friends) are not available in this version.
social.disabledSubtitle: You can re-enable social features in Settings.
social.syncSuccess: Your local data was sent to the leaderboard.
social.emptyLeaderboardFriends: Add friends to see the leaderboard
social.syncModalDescription: Your local data will be sent to the leaderboard so friends can see your progress.
social.removeFriendConfirmMessage: You will no longer see their stats and they cannot send you encouragements.
social.noEncouragementsSubtitle: Your friends can send you encouragements!
social.notificationsNetworkHint: A VPN or ad blocker may prevent delivery

subtitle.login: Sign in to access your social stats
subtitle.signup: Create an account to compare your performance

fossNotice.title: Limited features
fossNotice.text: This FOSS build is intended for F-Droid and does not include Firebase/FCM. Push notifications for encouragements are not available.

auth.privacyNote: By creating an account you agree that your weekly stats (XP, workouts, streak) may be shared with your friends.
auth.signupSuccessMessage: Welcome {{username}}! Your account was created successfully. Ready to challenge your friends?

errors.shortPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.invalidUsername: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters (letters, numbers, underscore)

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Spix respects your privacy. This policy explains how we handle your data in accordance with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).

localMode.title: Local Mode (default)
localMode.description: By default Spix runs 100% locally. Your data remains only on your device.
localMode.highlight: ‚úÖ No data is sent to a server in local mode.

foss.title: FOSS Edition (F-Droid)
foss.description: You are using the FOSS edition of Spix, built to comply with F-Droid guidelines. It runs in 100% local mode.
foss.note: üåø This edition is 100% free of proprietary trackers and cloud services.

social.title: Social Mode (opt-in)
social.description: If you enable social features, some data is shared with our Supabase server to enable leaderboards and interactions.
social.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è The detailed content of your sessions (exercises, notes, meals) is NEVER synced.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.fossNote: üåø This FOSS version does not include Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).
notifications.fossText: Local reminders work normally. However, remote push notifications (friend encouragements, friend requests) are not available in this build.
notifications.fossInstall: To get full push notifications, download the standard build from GitHub Releases.
notifications.disable: You can disable notifications at any time in your device settings.

healthConnect.title: Health Connect (Android)
healthConnect.description: Spix can import workouts and measurements from Google Health Connect on Android. This feature is optional.

usage.localImport: Local import only - no server upload
usage.choose: You choose which sessions to import

healthConnect.highlight: ‚úÖ Health Connect data is read and stored locally. Spix never writes to Health Connect.
healthConnect.revoke: You can revoke access at any time in your device's Health Connect settings.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.description: Under GDPR you have the right to:
rights.access: Access: View all your data (JSON export in Settings)
rights.deletion: Deletion: Delete all your data with one click
rights.portability: Portability: Export your data as JSON
rights.highlight: üí° To delete your online data, disable social features in Settings ‚Üí Social.

pollination.title: AI Meal Analysis (Beta)
pollination.description: Spix can optionally analyze your meal photos using Pollination.ai API. This feature is opt-in and requires explicit connection.

data.temporary: Images are uploaded to tmpfiles.org and automatically deleted after 1 hour
data.apiKey: Pollination API key (stored locally, never sent to our servers)

pollination.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è This is a beta feature. By using it, you agree that Pollination.ai may process your meal images to provide nutritional analysis. Pollination may collect anonymized usage data for service improvement.
pollination.optOut: You can disconnect from Pollination at any time in Settings ‚Üí Labs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For questions regarding your personal data, contact us via the app settings.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to Spix! By using this application, you agree to the following terms.

license.title: License & Open Source
license.description: Spix is free software under the GNU Affero General Public License version 3 (AGPLv3). The source code is available on GitHub.

appNature.title: Nature of the Application
appNature.description: Spix is a fitness tracking app with gamification. It offers:

features.tracking: Workout, run, meal and measurement tracking
features.gamification: XP system, levels, badges and quests

appNature.medicalDisclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Spix is not a medical tool. Consult a healthcare professional before starting any exercise program.

versions.title: App Versions
versions.description: Spix comes in two versions with different features:
versions.currentFoss: üåø You are currently using the FOSS version.

ploppy.title: Ploppy (AI Analysis)
ploppy.photos: Your photos are sent for analysis
ploppy.disable: Can be disabled at any time

social.title: Social Mode
social.delete: Data can be deleted on request

socialRules.title: Community Guidelines
socialRules.description: By using social features, you agree to:
socialRules.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Violations may result in social account suspension.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Spix is provided "as is" without warranty. We are not responsible for:

items.medical: Medical decisions based on the app

jurisdiction.title: Applicable Law
jurisdiction.description: These terms are governed by French law:

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.description: We may modify these terms at any time. Changes will be notified through an app update.
modifications.continued: Continued use of Spix after a modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: You can stop using Spix at any time. To delete your data:

items.delete: Delete your account in Settings (cloud data)

acceptance.title: Acceptance
acceptance.text: By using Spix, you confirm that you have read and accepted these terms of service and our privacy policy.
